--- create_change_stream_for_table.sql
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name

--- AST
&ast.CreateChangeStream{
  Create: 0,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 21,
    NameEnd: 39,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch: []*ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
    &ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
      TableName: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 44,
        NameEnd: 54,
        Name:    "table_name",
      },
      Columns: []*ast.Ident(nil),
      Rparen:  0,
    },
  },
  WatchAll: false,
  Options:  []ast.Expr(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name
